description:
doc/go1: document rearranged package hierarchy
Some exciting HTML and CSS here.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/2002/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/2002/doc/go1.html#newcode112 doc/go1.html:112: exp/template/html html/template isn't it exp/html/template ? http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/2002/doc/go1.html#newcode124 doc/go1.html:124: rpc net/rpc does this make clear enough that rpc/jsonrpc will be under net/rpc/jsonrpc? same thing for net/http/*.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/2002/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/2002/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode144 doc/go1.tmpl:144: exp/html/template packages have changed to cmplx line 110 is correct, it's here that exp/template/html is expected.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remyoudompheng@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/6001/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/6001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode99 doc/go1.tmpl:99: Old path You are allowed to drop the and and here, which might make this easier to read. Fine as is too.

On Dec 8, 2011, at 11:32 AM, rsc@golang.org wrote: > LGTM > > > > http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/6001/doc/go1.tmpl > File doc/go1.tmpl (right): > > http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047/diff/6001/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode99 > doc/go1.tmpl:99: Old path > You are allowed to drop the and and here, > which might make this easier to read. Fine as is too. we've been putting in

and too. i think they should stay. they're already there. -rob

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5b35b66c16dd ***

doc/go1: document rearranged package hierarchy
Some exciting HTML and CSS here.

R=remyoudompheng, rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5460047

subject: code review 5460047: doc/go1: document rearranged package hierarchy
